documents.document: @Sportsfreakconz only when he was all but forced to. I don't want to make the Baz comparison, but...
@NZCricketMuseum @kylemills79 this feels a bit like the Taylor/Williamson thing - Boult on track to comfortably beat these marks
@Sportsfreakconz next thing he'll play a forward defensive!
@sillymidoff was that right where he took the 'choke' catch in the CWC pool game?
@AWBiggs been a long time since I've done it too! #oldmanknees
@AWBiggs regular keepers pads aren't very restrictive, which I presume is why not many have made the shift. Interestingly to see it though
Is Handscomb wearing the kind of shin guards that bat-pads often wear? I've been expecting to see keepers doing that for a while #NZvAUS
Oh yes he did! https://t.co/U9EhjkVYyd
And here we go! https://t.co/U9EhjkVYyd
But also hoping for a 5 set classic, with at least half a dozen momentum shifts #AusOpen
I'm 100% #teamroger, in case anyone was wondering
@PeterClinton5 @aotearoaxi that's why I figured a Sunday d/N game would be the way to go. International flight yes, but not a long one
@aotearoaxi touche. akld is welcome to the game though, I'd just expect two of the three matches to be on weekend days
@elliottnz yes but that one gives me the day to drive back to wellington after it... The whole thing does seem a bit off
@MikeWesleySmith *cough* not too bad yet but I'll see how it is in the morning *cough cough*
Couldn't they have played the first #ChappellHadlee as a D/N game today? Aucklanders are on holiday tomorrow but not the rest of us!
@zealmanNZ @aotearoaxi don't think I've ever heard him express a preference. Can appreciate that he'd want to cement his spot as opener 1st
@aotearoaxi don't think there's any suggestion he'd be asked to keep and open in tests. + an ODI keeper/opener is pretty much the holy grail
@aotearoaxi are people considering that seeing latham with the gloves means we'll likely get Neesham AND Munro?
My cricket team had its first EVER regular season victory today. It sure feels better than losing again, I can tell you
@aldersonnotes that webpage is getting more hits than ever before today!
Roger Federer keeps me believing. Almost every time, I sit here thinking he's got another one in him #AusOpen
@PaulBMcGill @GaryMass6 very strange and it grew like topsy! Cut it out today though so hopefully that's the end of it
@GaryMass6 thanks! wife is now convinced it's poroporo - a native nightshade. Is that the same thing?
When we rented this house a year ago there was a small weed in the backyard. Now it's a tree. Can anyone identify iâ€¦ https://t.co/SZ58wrJUHl
TIL: playgrounds are packed with dads on Saturday mornings
Is Flem available for some slips coaching? #NZvBAN

@JamieBellNZ ah yes, some very nice #statchat there.
I wonder how many of the Smith-Hadlee combo were leg side strangles?#notmany
That's the record for 'c Watling, b Southee', right? #NZvBAN
Alright, alright already! https://t.co/MGG0lszW9V
Ok @BLACKCAPS, get two more wickets by 2.30pm and I'll come down to the @BasinReserve
Am I the only one that wanted another couple of looks at that review? #NZvBAN
@elliottnz I remember the game, just not that it was on tv
Great to see the #fordtrophy final will be televised. Don't recall that happening last year? https://t.co/Xj5DrUiFeC
Intriguing stuff @JamieBellNZ! - Mysteries at the New Zealand Cricket Museum https://t.co/ZTaRfvOWTk
@PaulBMcGill the mentality of both buyers and sellers in that situation is interesting though, right?
Two Lower Hutt houses have gone under offer within a day of being listed this week. Is that weird?
Long day in the field here at the Basin. Bangladesh batting us out of this one? https://t.co/eN9E3rim8S
@Sportsfreakconz good to see him with the breeze at his back today
If Tom Latham was actually left-handed that would've been a much clearer run out chance #NZvBAN
That's much better Wellington. Still a bit breezy though #NZvBAN https://t.co/UmCu6hqqMF
@CricketTragic58 I'd have turned Southee around after the rain break and got wagner up upwind. Don't think that cuts off options does it?
@Sportsfreakconz agree wagner's than for these conditions - should've been on much earlier for me
@aotearoaxi they could definitely play in this. But yes, suspect we're done for the day now
No real improvement in the weather, but the covers are coming off and play resumes in 8 minutes! #NZvBAN https://t.co/wvZKW3pYwf
@gillespieaw so v little competition for my spot on the bank
Here's the rain #NZvBAN https://t.co/6oLLk1F9eu
@LizM_T I've started off in my usual spot which must be the most exposed part of the ground. Suspect that won't last long
Neil Wagner can't wait to bowl into this howling northerly https://t.co/nEWTeGtKTB
Shots fired https://t.co/jlDK4efMYt
@BlackCapsNo1Fan trying to look on the bright side over here Jess!
@BLACKCAPS so, the run of win-toss-and-bowls will be continuing then!
If anything I think the weather forecast for #NZvBAN at the Basin might be improving ðŸ¤ž https://t.co/sCVh423CFW
Wow that building on Moleworth St is nearly gone! #eqnz https://t.co/c840Ye1G0J
@BlackCapsNo1Fan @BLACKCAPS oh no - looks like showers on Thursday might even be one of the better days!
@BlackCapsNo1Fan @BLACKCAPS oh dear, really? I was looking forward to claiming a spot on the bank for a few days
@richirvine reckon. Can't be long til he's back playing all formats
Really enjoying seeing Kane with the ball in this series. Long may it continue #NZvBAN
Interesting. Must've been tempting to rest some of the Test lineup today https://t.co/jbbzfJ4fBI
@bradmanesque certainly the biggest crowd of the season but I really hope it's not the players' pinnacle #PlunketShield
@realmshark it does seem like at least one of Worker and Blundell will have to play. Or is my maths wrong?
@realmshark yeah I'd suggest that means Bruce might be the more likely option behind the stumps tomorrow
@bradmanesque playing 3 days on the trot with the travel too? That'd definitely be too much even for the young guys
@AWBiggs surely he'd have played yesterday if someone got crooked in the warm ups? And the same tomorrow evening?
Bit surprised to see Worker playing in the #supersmash final - wasn't he at The Mount yesterday?
That was quick! https://t.co/1xEKzOxZcm
@shortflyslip I imagine CD fans might be a bit gutted about that!
@shortflyslip oh yeah? Hadn't heard about the injury - he'll be gutted about that
No room for Broom in the Test squad then, so they'll continue with Nicholls at 5 as I suspected #NZvBAN
@MarkCurrieNZ what happened?
Saw one other person on my evening stroll along Peka Peka beach #NewZealand https://t.co/izLQR8f887
@sgowsmith1988 @BLACKCAPS so nobody's got 3? Record chance on here with Santner on
That must be just about the most stumpings in an ODI for a @blackcaps? #NZvBAN
@thelegendaryss2 love that he's kept himself on - must've been tempting to stop after that first wicket
@CricketTragic58 Southee will be extremely well rested then! Take your point though - he's off the pace right now
@dougierydal I'm sure he's in the thinking, but probably only as injury cover. Suspect Munro is probably still ahead of him too
@dougierydal you reckon he needed a sweetener to play the ODIs? That would be a surprise to me
@dougierydal this team doesn't make selection decisions like that. Reckon they'll stick with Nicholls for the Bang tests at least
Pretty healthy #eqnz right there. Nobody seemed to notice at the cricket in Nelson though
A classy knock from @Ricky_solly is the only thing keeping us in this match. @BLACKCAPS need to have a better day with the ball now #NZvBAN
@andrewvoerman that would be a big call, on the basis of this one knock (it has been a good one though)
@PeterClinton5 in general I agree but this team's philosophy seems to be standing by the guys they've already picked
@PeterClinton5 hard to see them dropping the 25 year old incumbent for a 33 year old, isn't it?
So it feels a bit like he's on a hiding to nothing, which seems a bit rough especially as he's going so well today
And I think the answer is no. Taylor (presuming the eye recovers) and Munro have 4 and 5 sewn up and they need a bowling option at 6
@CricketTragic58 it is surprising that he's never really been given a shot at a middle order spot
Trying to think if there's anything Neil Broom can do in this series to keep his spot in the XI for the first Chapell-Hadlee game
That's some serious #statchat right there https://t.co/2flWvGvJzY
@LuxGolfToursNZ it was Guptill as of quite recently. Think KSW just did it in about 20 fewer innings (96 v 116?)
Fastest Kiwi to the mark by yonks https://t.co/pDYBuGhmV3
Sitting down to a @MyFoodBagNZ Xmas lunch, along with half the country https://t.co/Fyo1kOktrw
Little blue penguin sitting on Peka Peka beach. He doesn't look distressed but I'm not sure how normal that is https://t.co/XahiCPUEKH
A little #eqnz here in Te Horo to start Christmas Day
Sorry to hear this news - he's done a stellar job by all accounts, and is always up for a chat at the Basin. Go welâ€¦ https://t.co/aTI4AIYamZ
@richirvine ah that's the worst - horrible luck, just as the summer is ramping up
@richirvine bugger. Did it while bowling?
Rocket Lab moves another step to lift-off with successful testing of first stage of rocket https://t.co/at58z8evjE via @nzherald
Electric car share service for Wellington already has a waiting list https://t.co/HSX0WA9qN0
@MelSmith42 I really hope you're right, but now I can't stop thinking about the batman theme song
@MelSmith42 yes I fully expect that NZ grounds will be doing all of this stuff very shortly
